Text: EOGIL Divestiture DASH Cc Rick Heres a draft DASH for the Enron Oil Gas India Ltd divestiture which will be discussed in a conference call Wednesday between you Skilling Detmering and Sherrick Larson and Gorte have reviewed Regards Steve Original Message From Harper Stephen Sent Tuesday August PM To Larson Bradford Gorte David Cc Sherrick Jeffrey Detmering Timothy J Subject Divest DASH Importance High Sensitivity Confidential DetmeringSherrick deal terms included Plan is for Rick Buy to take to a Wednesday morning conference call with Skilling
